mapper.select: select seq, id, category, title, content, wdate, recommend, filename, newfilename from cls where category = #{category} and recommend = 1
select a.*, count(*) from cls a inner join likecls b on a.seq = b.seq group by a.seq order by count(*) desc
mapper.insert: insert into cls(id, category, title, content, wdate, recommend, filename, newfilename) values(#{id}, #{category}, #{title}, #{content}, now(), 0, #{filename}, #{newfilename})
